DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to improve first line Helicobacter pylori eradication rate and to compare the sequential versus conventional triple therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Conventional Triple Therapy Versus Sequential Therapy for H. Pylori in Peptic Ulcer Disease: Prospective Randomized Trial
DOC.criteria: peptic ulcer diseae two test positive rapid urease test, culture, histology lactating or pregnant previous stomach surgery severe underlying disease
